
       Name: Test case 1
Description: Test body mismatch error
       File: testdata/errors-example/case1.yaml

Request:
     Method: GET
       Path: /text
      Query: ?aaa=bbb
       Body:
<no body>

Response:
     Status: 200 OK
       Body:
1234


     Result: ERRORS!

Errors:

1) service 'response body' comparison: at path '$' values do not match:
     expected: 123
       actual: 1234
